data.name: ROBLOX 2011 Remastered
data.description:
How to uninstall / turn off:
I really can't tell whether the revamped extension has a crap UI or the end user is at fault. It appears it's easier to leave a bad review than it is to uninstall it lol

Navigate to the ROBLOX website > Click the Stylish extension icon > Click "Installed" > Find ROBLOX 2011 Remastered > Click the bin to delete, or the switch to temporarily disable.

Alright lads - I've decided to redo this style from the ground up, and given my lazy efforts & the amount of bugs present in this version, we're back in alpha. I thought I'd release something at least usable while I'm in a state between actually doing it and giving up again.

Do not ask me to create more 'old-style' themes for ROBLOX, it's too much work. - When ROBLOX update things on their side, I have to fix issues that may appear on each and every theme just to keep you guys happy. I simply do not have the time.

user.name: FatMonsterIsEatin
user.about:
Hi! I make power-hungry styles.

If you enjoy my styles or have something on your mind just drop a review and I'll give it a read c:

I read private messages by the way c: however if you want to get hold of me and have a response a lot sooner contact me on Discord: BantaLads#3811

data.css:
@-moz-document domain("www.roblox.com"), domain("roblox.com"), domain("web.roblox.com") {
/*
- - - Do not reupload unmodified/modified versions of this source. - - -

| - - -
|
|  If you would like to make an addition/change to this style (e.g. themes / fixes), please enable it in your browser & create a new style specifically to commit changes to this one.
|
|  e.g.
|  If you were only changing rules for #container-main, your style will only feature #container-main w/ relevant rules.
|
| - - -
|
|  Upon release, please instruct users to install & enable this style prior to installing & enabling your own. 
|  If you want to create your own version of 2011 from the ground up, assuming you know what you're doing, go for it lol 
|
| - - -
*/
body {background: url("https://web.archive.org/web/20110530215749im_/http://www.roblox.com/images/cssspecific/rbx2/bkg.jpg") top center repeat-x;background-color: #000444 !important;min-width: 900px;max-width: 900px;margin: 0px auto;}#ResponsiveWrapper, #container-main > .content {background: none;background-color: none;}#wrap {position: relative;max-width: 900px;margin: auto;}.container-footer {position: static;}/*#HomeContainer, */#container-main {background: linear-gradient(45deg, #e7e7e7 0px, #e7e7e7 20px, #f3f3f3 20px, #f3f3f3 40px, #e7e7e7 40px, #e7e7e7 60px, #f3f3f3 60px, #f3f3f3 80px);background-size: 56px 56px;background-position: 28px top;}#HomeContainer {padding: 10px;}#header {position: static;padding-top: 195px;background: url("https://web.archive.org/web/20110530215749im_/http://www.roblox.com/images/cssspecific/rbx2/head_03.jpg") no-repeat;background-position: top center;margin-top: 0px;}.rbx-navbar-header .navbar-brand {position: absolute;display: block;left: calc(50% - 170px);top: 95px;width: 340px;height: 80px;opacity: 0;}#header .container-fluid {height: 30px;border-top: 1px solid #86c3ff;border-bottom: 1px solid #02213e;background: linear-gradient(0deg, #015fb7, #0085ff);}#header .rbx-navbar li:hover, #navigation .left-col-list li:hover {border: none;background: linear-gradient(0deg, #0078e0, #00b2ff);}#header .rbx-navbar {width: 100%;height: 30px;margin: 0px;display: block;}#header .rbx-navbar li {float: left;display: inline-block;vertical-align: top;height: 28px;padding-top: 1px;}#header .rbx-navbar li:nth-child(1) {margin-left: 120px;}#header .rbx-navbar li a, #navigation .left-col-list li span {font-weight: 600 !important;line-height: 28px;padding: 0px 10px;color: #fff;font-family: Arial;font-size: 16px;}#header .navbar-right {position: absolute;top: 0px;left: 0px;width: 100%;}#navigation .left-col-list li:nth-child(2) {margin-right: 345px;}#navbar-universal-search, .navbar-stream, .rbx-menu-item[data-bind="popover-setting"] {display: none !important;}#navbar-setting .dropdown-menu {background: none;box-shadow: none;}#navbar-setting .dropdown-menu li {display: none;}#navbar-setting .dropdown-menu li:nth-child(3) {display: block;}#navigation {position: absolute;top: 0px;left: 0px;height: auto;background: none;box-shadow: none;overflow: visible;}#navigation .rbx-scrollbar {overflow: visible;}#navigation #mCSB_1 {overflow: visible;}#navigation #mCSB_1_container, #navigation .rbx-scrollbar {position: absolute !important;width: 900px;top: 0px !important;padding: 0px;height: 28px;z-index: 1000;pointer-events: none;}#navigation .made_by {background-color: #297063;position: absolute;z-index: 1;left: 0px;top: 0px;display: block;}#mCSB_1_container {overflow: visible;}#navigation .rbx-scrollbar .left-col-list {position: absolute;height: 30px;overflow: visible;top: 195px;padding: 0px;width: 890px;padding-left: 5px;pointer-events: none;white-space: nowrap;}#navigation .left-col-list li a div:nth-child(1), #navigation .left-col-list li:nth-child(1), #navigation .left-col-list li:nth-child(7), #navigation .left-col-list li:nth-child(11), #navigation .left-col-list li:nth-child(12) {display: none;color: rgb(29, 70, 63);}#navigation .left-col-list li {height: 28px;line-height: 28px;margin: 0px;padding: 0px 10px;padding-top: 2px;display: inline-block;vertical-align: top;pointer-events: all;cursor: pointer;}#navigation .left-col-list li a, #navigation .left-col-list li:hover a {color: #fff;}#navigation .left-col-list li a, #navigation .left-col-list li span {height: 28px;line-height: 28px;padding: 0px;margin: 0px;}#navigation .rbx-upgrade-now, .left-col-list .small, .rbx-nav-sponsor, #mCSB_1 #mCSB_1_scrollbar_vertical, #nav-shop {display: none !important;}#container-main {margin-top: 29px;}#content-main .content {background-color: initial;}#header .container-fluid .rbx-nav-collapse {display: none !important;}#navigation .text-lead .text-nav[href*="/profile"] {color: #000;font-weight: 400;font-family: Arial;font-size: 12px;padding: 0px 10px;pointer-events: none;/*background: linear-gradient(0deg, #626262 1px, #d0d0d0 1px, #d0d0d0 25%, #fefefe);border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;*/position: absolute;left: -10px;top: 85px;height: 28px;line-height: 28px;text-overflow: hidden;white-space: nowrap;max-width: 92px;}#navigation .rbx-divider, #nav-trade {display: none;}.navbar-right #navbar-setting .rbx-popover-content, .navbar-right #navbar-setting .dropdown-menu[role="menu"], .navbar-right #navbar-setting {display: block;position: static;z-index: 2;}.rbx-menu-item[data-bind*="/logout"] {position: absolute !important;top: 95px;left: 0px;z-index: 1;display: block !important;line-height: 15px;text-align: right;color: #fff !important;border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;font-size: 0px;background: linear-gradient(0deg, #626262 1px, #d0d0d0 1px, #d0d0d0 25%, #fefefe);width: 140px;height: 28px;pointer-events: none;}.rbx-menu-item[data-bind*="/logout"] div {font-size: 0px;}body:after {content:"ROBLOX 2011 Remastered / v1.3a";text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px #000;position: fixed;left: 5vw;bottom: 8vh;font-size: 2.5vh;color: #fff;pointer-events: none;opacity: 0.25;}.rbx-menu-item[data-bind*="/logout"]:after {position: absolute;content: "Logout";text-align: center;z-index: -1;right: 14px;background: linear-gradient(0deg, #2b6dae, #4692d6);width: 43px;height: 15px;top: calc(50% - 7px);font-size: 8px;pointer-events: all;}.rbx-menu-item[data-bind*="/logout"]:hover:after {background: linear-gradient(0deg, #0078e0, #00b2ff);}/* Games */#GamesPageLeftColumn {background: none;}/* Top right header */#navigation-messages, #navigation-friends, #navbar-robux {position: absolute;top: -78px;right: -10px;width: 147px !important;padding: 0px !important;height: 55px !important;pointer-events: none !important;cursor: default !important;}#navigation-messages {}#navbar-robux {background: linear-gradient(0deg, #626262 1px, #d0d0d0 1px, #d0d0d0 25%, #fefefe);position: absolute;right: 0px;top: 117px !important;border-radius: 3px;}#navigation-messages:hover {background: none !important;}#navigation-friends:hover {background: none !important;}#navigation-messages:before {content: " ";z-index: -1;position: absolute;width: 100%;height: 23px;background: linear-gradient(0deg, #5f5f5f 10%, #5f5f5f 70%, #272727 100%);top: 100%;left: 0px;-webkit-mask: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 11px, #fff 11px, #fff 22px, transparent 22px, transparent 124px, #fff 124px, #fff 135px, transparent 135px);mask: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 11px, #fff 11px, #fff 22px, transparent 22px, transparent 124px, #fff 124px, #fff 135px, transparent 135px);}#nav-robux-amount {position: absolute;top: 0px;left: 0px;width: 100%;}#nav-robux {padding: 0px;cursor: not-allowed;}#nav-robux:after {content: "0";color: #a16813;}#nav-robux:hover:after {color: #e5b627;}#navigation-friends a > span, #navigation-messages a > span {font-size: 0px !important;display: none;}#navigation .notification, #navbar-robux a span:nth-child(2), #nav-robux {background-color: transparent !important;color: #4e4e4e;font-size: 12px !important;height: 22px !important;}#navigation-messages a, #navigation-friends a, #navbar-robux a {display: inline-block;position: absolute;left: 8%;top: 3% !important;width: 42%;height: 42% !important;pointer-events: all;}#navigation-friends a {top: 2% !important;left: 53%;}#navbar-robux a {top: 49% !important;}#nav-robux {position: absolute;top: 2px;left: 106%;width: 100%;background-position: left -120px !important;}#nav-robux:hover {background-position: left -140px !important;}#navigation-messages a div, #navigation-friends a div {width: 100%;height: 100%;text-align: center;}#navigation-messages a div span, #navigation-friends a div span, #navbar-robux a span:nth-child(2), #nav-robux {display: block !important;line-height: 18px !important;height: 22px;background-repeat: no-repeat;background-position: left 0px;background-image: url("https://web.archive.org/web/20110413053328if_/http://www.roblox.com/images/cssspecific/rbx2/head_infobox_icons.png");padding-left: 22px !important;color: #4e4e4e !important;font-weight: 600 !important;font-family: Arial;}#navbar-robux a span:nth-child(2) {background-position: left -40px;color: #058100 !important;}#navbar-robux a span:nth-child(2):hover {background-position: left -60px;color: #0ecf00 !important;}#navigation-friends a div span {background-position: left -80px;color: #0059b5 !important;}#navigation-friends a:hover div span {background-position: left -100px;color: #00a3ef !important;}#navigation-messages a:hover div span {background-position: left -20px;color: #929292 !important;}#navigation-messages a > span {display: none !important;}#navigation-messages a div span[title="0"]:after {content: "0";}#header .age-bracket-label {display: none;position: absolute;left: 0px;top: 160px;}/* Redefinitions */a[href*="/upgrades/robux"] {font-size: 0px !important;}a[href*="/upgrades/robux"]:after {content:"Builders Club";font-size: 16px;}a[href*="/catalog/"] {font-size: 0px !important;}a[href*="/catalog/"]:after {content:"Catalog";font-size: 16px;}#nav-blog > span {font-size: 0px !important;}#nav-blog > span:after {content:"News";font-size: 16px;}#nav-profile > span {font-size: 0px !important;}#nav-profile > span:after {content:"My ROBLOX";font-size: 16px;}#navigation .text-lead .text-nav[href*="/profile"]:before {content: "Hi ";}/* - - - Page rules - - - */.no-gutter-ads.logged-in .content {margin-left: 0px;}.container-main.full-screen .content {margin-right: 0px;max-width: 100%;}.games-list-container .horizontal-scroller, #HomeContainer .hlist { /* Silver bg */background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #e6e6e6, #fff 105px, #fff);border: 1px solid #aaa;padding: 10px;}.container-header h3 {position: relative;background-color: #e6e6e6;padding: 5px 12px;margin-bottom: -1px !important;border: 1px solid #aaa;border-bottom: none;border-top-left-radius: 5px;line-height: 21px;height: 31px;padding-right: 20px;z-index: 1;-webkit-mask: linear-gradient(45deg, #fff, #fff 85%, transparent 85.1%);mask: linear-gradient(45deg, #fff, #fff 85%, transparent 85.1%);background: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, transparent 84.99%, #aaa 85%);}.container-header {z-index: 1;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}.container-header h3:before {content: " ";position: absolute;left: 0px;top: 0px;width: 100%;height: 100%;background: linear-gradient(0deg, #e6e6e6, #ffffff);z-index: -1;border-top-left-radius: 5px;-webkit-mask: linear-gradient(45deg, #fff, #fff 85%, transparent 85.1%);mask: linear-gradient(45deg, #fff, #fff 85%, transparent 85.1%);}.container-header h3 {margin-bottom: -1px;font-size: 16px;font-family: Arial;}/* - - - Games - - - */.game-card {margin-right: 0px;margin-left: 20px;height: initial !important;margin-top: 5px;position: relative;}.game-card-container {width: 160px;}.game-card .game-card-thumb-container {height: 100px;}.game-card .game-card-thumb-container, .game-card .game-card-thumb-container img {overflow: hidden;border-radius: 0px !important;width: 160px;}.game-card .game-card-thumb-container img {margin-top: -30px;}.game-card .game-card-thumb-container:before {border-radius: 0px;}.game-card-name {font-size: 12px !important;margin: 0px !important;overflow: hidden;white-space: nowrap;color: blue;margin-top: -5px !important;}.game-card-name:hover {text-decoration: underline;}.game-card-thumb-container {padding-right: 0px;}.games-list-container {background-color: transparent !important;}.game-card-info .icon-votes-gray, .game-card-info .icon-playing-counts-gray {display: none !important;}.game-card-info .vote-percentage-label, .game-card-info .no-vote {position: absolute;bottom: -16px;display: none !important;}.vote-percentage-label:before {content: "Favorited ";}.vote-percentage-label:after {content: " overall";}.playing-counts-label {color: red !important;cursor: text;}.playing-counts-label:after {content: " players online";}.games-list-container .horizontal-scroller {height: auto !important;min-height: 0px !important;}.horizontal-scroll-window {padding-bottom: 0px !important;}.games-list-container {margin-bottom: 0px !important; /* Nice hot-fix ya got there ROBLOX lol */}.home-header {padding: 20px 10px;margin: 0px;width: calc(100% - 10px);text-align: center;}.home-header-content {width: 100%;}.home-header-content h1 {margin-top: 15px;}.home-header-content h1:before {content: "Hi, ";}.home-header-content h1:after {content: "!";}.home-header .avatar {display: block !important;float: initial;margin: auto 0px;text-align: center;left: calc(50% - 75px); /* I ain't understand why this ain't centred anyway */}#home-avatar-thumb {margin: auto 0px;}.home-header-content:after {background: url('data:image/png;base64,') no-repeat;background-position: 10px center;background-size: 30px;display: block;text-align: left;padding: 20px 10px;padding-left: 60px;content: "Hello! This is an extremely early remaster of the ROBLOX 2011 Style on Userstyles. There *will* be bugs. Please disable other enabled styles.";color: #fff;background-color: #e22;width: 90%;left: 5%;position: relative;margin: 50px 0px;}}

data.name: HDrezka ‚Äî Simple Theme [Light]
HDrezka ‚Äî Simple Theme [Dark]
Custom Username Colors
data.description: A style made to change a username's color. Want your color to be changed? Message user: "Salient" a hex code (color-hex.com), and wait for me to update the style (takes approximately two minutes or less). Don't install until I tell you its been updated! Also, don't forget to update the style weekly!
